name: 360report
tag_list: sustainability-report, csr-report, global-reporting-initiative, gri, iso26000, united-nations-global-compact, greenhouse-gas-protocol, ghg
overview:
360report is an innovative software-as-a-service solution that enables companies to compile a sustainability report according to global standards without prior knowledge. Within a few days and for only 1.990 EUR.

360report allows a company to easily and quickly create a sustainability report corresponding to the guidelines of the Global Reporting Initiative (GRI), UN Global Compact, ISO 26000 and Greenhouse Gas Protocol (GHG Protocol).

360report features a high level of standardization. An innovative input logic guides the user through the entire process of data input and greatly simplifies it. Free text field input is limited to a minimum. Having entered the data, the report is generated automatically as a PDF and Word document - ready to use in the communication with the stakeholders.

The reduction in complexity with 360report is unique. Hence, 360report is perfectly suited for small and medium sized companies that until now have refrained from compiling a report due to the high financial and time effort.

No installation or training is needed before starting to use 360report. Updates and the integration of new services and functions are carried out automatically.
